reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: - Support to state driven justice sector to be more responsive to needs of identified vulnerable groups. Develop and deliver gender mainstreamed training modules including a specific gender component for the formal justice sector- Support the reconciliat ion committee including district level office set up. Identify sources of local conflicts and current conflict resolution practices at community level including a gender sensitive conflict mapping and analysis- Support youth + women networks and the dev elopment of a gender focused participatory training on conflict resolution in collaboration with Bule Hora University. Provide support for the mediation work of the traditional leaders in community reconciliation.

tag.narrative: Improving democracy in societies is the main priority area in this activity
